channel.title: news on Anarchy Linux
channel.description: Recent content in news on Anarchy Linux

item.title: Telegram group
item.description: We’re announcing the creation of a discussion group in the Telegram instant messaging service. You are invited to join the group by clicking on this link, to discuss new ideas and features to be implemented in future releases. Together we can make Anarchy more than just an installer! We’re hoping to see you soon!

item.title: New Website
item.description: You’ve stumbled upon our revamped website. It was built to be modern and fast using the Hugo static website generator and the Terrassa theme. If you haven’t already, check out our Github project page.
